Add template comments to all documents in the directory.

add_template_comments.add_template_comments(directory: Optional[Union[str, os.PathLike]] = None)¶

Add template comments to all documents in the directory.

Add template comments to all documents in directory. If directory is not supplied, then use the hardcoded paths defined in shared.PY.

Parameters

directory – The directory containing the documents to add template comments to.

Delete all comments from all documents in the directory.

delete_all_comments.delete_all_comments(directory: Optional[Union[str, os.PathLike]] = None)¶

Delete all comments from all documents in the directory.

Delete all comments from all documents in directory. If directory is not supplied, then use the hardcoded paths defined in shared.py.

Parameters

directory – The directory containing the documents with comments to be deleted.

Open all documents in preparation for grading.

open_all.open_all(directory: Optional[Union[str, os.PathLike]] = None)¶

Open all documents in preparation for grading.

Parameters

directory – The directory containing the documents to open.

Shared values.
